nodes.text: A poison dart, or referred to as a toxic dart, was a type of dart. Poison darts were fired from needle dart guns to inject poisons. A Kamino saberdart was a toxic dart from the planet Kamino, and was identifiable by the cuts on the side. Kamino saberdarts used a combination of Malkite themfar and Fex-M3, and the bounty hunter Jango Fett once used a Kamino saberdart to kill Zam Wesell. The assassin droid IG-88 carried poison darts.
